taskbody.context: If you are using the Daemon Process Down portlet, zencatalogservice may be listed as down immediately after upgrading to this release. The status is incorrect and can be corrected by using this procedure to clear heartbeat events.

step.cmd: Log in to the browser interface as a user with ZenManager or Manager privileges.
In the left panel, select Events.
At the bottom of the Event Configuration page, click the Clear button.
